list_definition.definition: to change something so that it is exactly what you want or need

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The software allows you to customize the appearance on-screen to suit your own needs.

list_ex_of_english: For example, in a pervasive system, the modelling of location data may be customized to the capabilities of the sensor equipment.
The user may configure and customize the agent according to one's personal preferences.
Correct configurations improve customer satisfaction in that the customer receives a product customized to their needs.
Its adaptable control tables are easy to customize for special applications or for turnkey operation.
Then, tuple centres can be conceived as general-purpose coordination artifacts, which can be customized (programmed, tuned) dynamically to entail a specific coordinating behaviour.
The supplier may be able to customize the agent according to the user's preferences.
Further, the process can be customized to meet specific application requirements.
The context can also be customized by composition.
